summary:
Keep and Solana are two projects to keep an eye on
An interesting new concept has been created by the project PoolTogether. Users can enter a “lottery” where money is pooled together to be then be lended out on the open finance platform Dharma for 15 days. All the users receive their principal, but one lucky user receives all of the interest earned
author: Contributor Network
The Block
title: Proof of Work: Lottery concept comes to open finance
